overview: A short Arizona motorcycle cop gets his wish and is promoted to Homicide following the mysterious murder of a hermit. He is forced to confront his illusions about himself and those around him in order to solve the case, eventually returning to solitude in the desert.
tagline: He's A Good Cop..... On A Big Bike..... On A Bad Road.
cast: Robert Blake|Billy Green Bush|Mitchell Ryan|Jeannine Riley|Elisha Cook Jr.
